main.name: Tou Xiong
main.description: I enjoy solving problems and building effective applications. If I'm away from the computer, you can find me on the lake fishing or in the sky with the pigeons
main.bio: Experienced professional with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Web Development, Software as a Service (SaaS), Sales, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), and Business Development. Strong business development professional turned Full Stack Developer.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Prime Digital Academy is a 20 week accelerated learning program teaching the foundational software engineering skills through a full-stack development curriculum.

education.degree: Courses taken towards a Bachelor of Science in Economics

work.title: Full-Stack Developer Student
work.description: The Intersection - Group Project: The Intersection is a nonprofit organization that bridges volunteers and people experiencing homelessness. Working alongside another 4 developers, we built the client a centralized application that efficiently managed data from a donation day.
work.description2: HV Rentals - Solo Project: Built a web application that streamlines the reservation process for local RV rental business. Developed an efficient reservation process while keeping all business needs in mind.

work.title: Supervisor - Part-Time
work.description: Manage a diverse team of 5 attendants. Use SKIDATA software to maintain ramps, generate reports, and monitor activity.

work.title: Account Development Representative
work.description: Worked directly with the Apprise ERP software as a Business Development Rep. Engaged prospects on the value of industry specific ERP solutions and driving change. Also, developed sales strategies to increase business revenue.

projects.title: Donation Day Hub
